blogPost.excerpt: In the information age, access to global networking is a basic human right. We made the Abacus because the world deserves an affordable & biodegradable PC that is made with the same care and craftsmanship as a Mac.
blogPost.body: In the information age, access to global networking is a basic human right. We made the Abacus because the world deserves an affordable & biodegradable PC that is made with the same care and craftsmanship as a Mac.
blogPost.title: The Abacus - Affordable and biodegradable PC
blogPost.author: Chris Messina

localize.description: 在信息时代，使用全球网络是一项基本人权。我们制造算盘是因为这个世界理应拥有一台价格合理、可生物降解的PC，它的制造工艺和工艺与Mac一样。
localize.tagline: 价格实惠、可生物降解的PC

localize.description: 在信息時代，使用全球網絡是一項基本人權。我們製造算盤是因爲這個世界理應擁有一臺價格合理、可生物降解的PC，它的製造工藝和工藝與Mac一樣。
localize.tagline: 價格實惠、可生物降解的PC

previous.excerpt: Appect is a magical landing page builder for mobile app owners that converts store links into landing pages in a seconds. You can create unlimited landing pages by picking from our beautifully crafted themes, track visitors and downloads and collect feedback!
previous.title: Appect - Turn your store link into a cool landing page in seconds

localize.description: Appect是一个神奇的登陆页面生成器，为移动应用程序所有者，在几秒钟内将商店链接转换为登陆页面。您可以从我们精美的主题中选择创建无限的着陆页，跟踪访问者和下载，并收集反馈意见!
localize.tagline: 在几秒钟内将您的商店链接变成一个很酷的登陆页面。

localize.description: Appect是一個神奇的登陸頁面生成器，爲移動應用程序所有者，在幾秒鐘內將商店鏈接轉換爲登陸頁面。您可以從我們精美的主題中選擇創建無限的着陸頁，跟蹤訪問者和下載，並收集反饋意見!
localize.tagline: 在幾秒鐘內將您的商店鏈接變成一個很酷的登陸頁面。

next.excerpt: A bot who helps to monitor Elon's twitter and notify you instantly via Discord app. You no longer have to keep refreshing on his twitter, or mess up your twitter notifications to just follow him.
next.title: Trade on Elon Tweets - Never missed any tweet, go buying before everyone knows.

localize.description: 一个帮助监控Elon的twitter并通过Discord应用即时通知你的机器人。你再也不用不停地刷新他的微博，也不用为了关注他而搞乱你的微博通知了。
localize.tagline: 从来没有错过任何一条微博，趁大家还没知道，赶紧去买吧。

localize.description: 一個幫助監控Elon的twitter並通過Discord應用即時通知你的機器人。你再也不用不停地刷新他的微博，也不用爲了關注他而搞亂你的微博通知了。
localize.tagline: 從來沒有錯過任何一條微博，趁大家還沒知道，趕緊去買吧。
